## IFeatureExecutionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IFeatureExecutionOptions
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                      | Modifiers | Type                                               | Description                                                                                                                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [allowedErrors?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.allowederrors.md)                 |           | Array&lt;string \| RegExp&gt;                      | <i>(Optional)</i> Error messages that are allowed to stay unhandled without failing the tests. strings are tested for exact match.                     |
| [browserContextOptions?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.browsercontextoptions.md) |           | playwright.BrowserContextOptions                   | <i>(Optional)</i> Passed down to <code>browser.newContext()</code>                                                                                     |
| [config?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.config.md)                               |           | [TopLevelConfig](./engine-core.toplevelconfig.md)  | <i>(Optional)</i> Allows providing a Top level config If configName was provided, the matching configurations will be overriden by the config provided |
| [configName?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.configname.md)                       |           | string                                             | <i>(Optional)</i> configuration file name scoped to feature root directory.                                                                            |
| [featureName?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.featurename.md)                     |           | string                                             | <i>(Optional)</i> feature file name scoped to feature root directory. if feature name is the same as folder name, scoping is unnecessary.              |
| [navigationOptions?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.navigationoptions.md)         |           | Parameters&lt;playwright.Page\['goto'\]&gt;\[1\]   | <i>(Optional)</i> Creates a playwright trace file for the test                                                                                         |
| [queryParams?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.queryparams.md)                     |           | Record&lt;string, string&gt;                       | <i>(Optional)</i> query parameters to open the page with                                                                                               |
| [runOptions?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.runoptions.md)                       |           | Record&lt;string, string&gt;                       | <i>(Optional)</i> runtime options that will be provided to the node environments                                                                       |
| [tracing?](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.tracing.md)                             |           | boolean \| [Tracing](./engine-test-kit.tracing.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Creates a playwright trace file for the test                                                                                         |
